column1: The Pit Room////The brisket is really
column3: really good and I actually liked the turkey as well. It wasn't dry at all and quite tasty. Husband had the venison sausage which is slightly spicy and very tasty
column4: though nothing I'd go to get again. The mustard potato salad side goes really well with the BBQ
column5: the chips have just the right amount of salt
column6: but then the elote (the corn) we thought was just OK. Not good not bad
column7: just OK. They had the okra side special the day we went
column8: which I wish I had tried
column9: looks quite good in photos posted here on yelp.
